title: Hồng Nhan Xưa ( Nirvana in fire OST - 红颜旧 -  OST Lang Nha Bảng)
lyrics: Xi feng ye du han shan yu Jia guo yi xi can meng li Si jun bu jian bei si jun Bie li nan ren ren bie li Lang yan feng huo he shi xiu Cheng wang bai kou jin dong liu La ju yi can lei nan gan Jiang shan wei lao hong yan jiu Ren bie li Bu ren que you bie li Tuo hong yan nan qu Bu zhi ci xin he ji Hong yan jiu Ren ping dou zhuan xing yi Wei bu bian ci qing you you Lang yan feng huo he shi xiu Cheng wang bai kou jin dong liu La ju yi can lei nan gan Jiang shan wei lao hong yan jiu Ren bie li Bu ren que you bie li Tuo hong yan nan qu Bu zhi ci xin he ji Hong yan jiu Ren ping dou zhuan xing yi Wei bu bian ci qing you you Ren bie li Bu ren que you bie li Tuo hong yan nan qu Bu zhi ci xin he ji Hong yan jiu Ren ping dou zhuan xing yi Wei bu bian ci qing you you Wei bu bian ci qing you you Wei bu bian ci qing you you
